altTitles.ja: 死して生きるSSS級ハンター

altTitles.th: นักล่าพลีชีพ ระดับ SSS

description.de:
In dem mysteriösen, einem RPG Dungeon ähnelnden Turm lebt der alle berühmten Hunter beneidende Gong-Ja Kim sein alltägliches Leben.
Eines Tages wird sein Wunsch nach mehr mit einem legendären Skill beantwortet, mit dem er die Fähigkeiten anderer kopieren kann ... auf Kosten seines eigenen Lebens.
Bevor er einen Sinn daraus ziehen kann, wird er vom Rang 1 Hunter, dem Flame Emperor, ermordet!
Das aktiviert aber seinen Skill und nun besitzt er einen neuen, nämlich die Möglichkeit, durch seinen Tod in der Zeit zurückzureisen.
Wie wird Gong-Ja dieses Skills nutzen, um seine Konkurrenz zu überflügeln und die Spitze zu erreichen?
description.en:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?
description.id:
Sebuah menara tiba-tiba muncul di dunia. Dari sisi mana pun di bumi, menara tersebut tetap terlihat menembus horizon. Berbagai monster memenuhi tiap lantai yang ada di menara itu. Orang yang masuk dalam menara itu ternyata bisa mendapatkan skill! Semua orang akhirnya berbondong-bondong untuk memburu para monster dan menjadi hunter kelas dunia.

"Tapi aku hanya hunter kelas F yang tidak punya skill apa-apa, aku juga mau skill kelas S! Tunggu..."

CRING!

"Itu... Kartu emas? Akhirnya kemunculan skill-ku datang juga?"

[Skill Level S+]
[BISA MENDUPLIKASI SKILL ORANG YANG MEMBUNUHMU, HANYA TERAKTIVASI KETIKA KAMU MATI]

"Skill ini... Apa gunanya skill semacam ini?!"

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/SSS-Class-Revival-Hunter/46)
description.ja:
Fランクのおちこぼれハンター「孔子」 ランキング１位の「炎帝」を妬む日々を過ごしていた孔子は、ある日「敵のスキルをコピーできる」というS級スキルを手に入れる。 しかし喜びも束の間、このスキル…何かがおかしい！！ なに！？発動条件がオレの死…？最高のハンターを目指す孔子の挑戦が始まる…！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/65543)
description.ko:
F급 말단 헌터 ‘김공자‘.
랭킹 1위 ‘염제‘를 부러워하던 어느 날, 무려 S+급 스킬을 얻는다.
하지만 기쁨도 잠시, 어째 스킬 내용이 이상하다?!
 
상대의 스킬 중 1개를 복사한다,까지는 좋은데…
 
"뭐? 내가 죽어야만 발동된다고?!"
 
죽어야 사는 헌터의 인간찬가 <SSS급 죽어야 사는 헌터>

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/SSS%EA%B8%89-%EC%A3%BD%EC%96%B4%EC%95%BC-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%ED%97%8C%ED%84%B0/2454)
description.th:
เป็นตอนที่ทำให้เสียน้ำตาแบบมากๆตั้งแต่พาเนลที่พระเอกเดินเข้ามาในบ้านยันตอนสุดท้ายที่ปลอบโยนดวงวิญญาณ ไม่ใช่การกำจัดบอสเพราะต้อง"กำจัด"เพียงอย่างเดียว แต่พระเอกตกตระกอนความคิดตอนเห็นเรื่องราวในอดีตได้เลยเลือกที่จะกำจัดโดยใช้วิธีปลอบโยนแทน มันแบบ อือ เหมียนหมา

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%9E_%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A_SSS/98)
description.pt-br:
Eu também quero uma habilidade Rank S! Eu quero tanto que eu poderia morrer por isso!

[Você despertou uma habilidade Rank S.] [Mas só funciona quando você morre.]
Eh !? DO QUE ELA VAI SERVIR SE EU JÁ ESTIVER MORTO!?
description.zh-hk:
身處F級底層的獵人「金孔子」
長久以來一直羨慕著排行第一的獵人「炎帝」。
某天，他竟突然獲得了S+級的技能。
不料，短暫開心過後，
他發現這個技能有些古怪?!

「複製對方的其中一種技能」
到這裡都還不錯...

「什麼?竟然要我死了才能發動?!」

重生獵人的人生樂章——
《SSS級死而復生的獵人》

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/SSS%E7%B4%9A%E6%AD%BB%E8%80%8C%E5%BE%A9%E7%94%9F%E7%9A%84%E7%8D%B5%E4%BA%BA/96)

title.en: Tenkuu no Shiro o Moratta no de Isekai de Tanoshiku Asobitai

altTitles.ja-ro: Tenkuu no Shiro wo Moratta node Isekai de Tanoshiku Asobitai

altTitles.ja: 天空の城をもらったので異世界で楽しく遊びたい

altTitles.ko: 천공의 성을 받았으니 이세계에서 즐겁게 놀고싶다

altTitles.en: I Want To Play Happily In Another World Because I Got A Heavenly Castle

altTitles.zh: 带着天空城遨游异世界

altTitles.fr: Je veux jouer et être heureux car j’ai eu le château celeste

altTitles.en: I Want to Play Happily Because I Got the Heavenly Castle

altTitles.pt-br: Quero jogar feliz em outro mundo porque tenho um castelo celestial

description.en:
An angel made a mistake, resulting in Shiihara Daiki’s death. In order to hide the mistake, he was then sent to a different world. The angel will grant him one wish as a payment for keeping it a secret. Daiki asked for a Heavenly Castle floating in the sky without hesitation.  
Suddenly a floating castle appeared in the new world, which causes confusion amongst the people. They attempt to contact Daiki in various ways. A country tries to steal it by force, while another seeks to befriend him. What in the world would Daiki do?
description.fr:
Un ange fit une erreur qui provoqua la mort de Shiihara Daiki. Pour cacher cette erreur, il fut envoyé dans un monde différent. L’ange lui accorda un vœu en tant que payement pour qu’il garde cela secret. Daiki demanda pour un château céleste qui flotte dans le ciel sans hésitation.
Soudainement, un château flottant apparut dans le nouveau monde, ce qui causa une confusion parmi les populations. Ils essayèrent de contacter Daiki de plusieurs manières. Un pays essaye de le voler de force, pendant qu’un autre tente d’être amis avec lui. Que va donc faire Daiki ?
 




---

- Site officiel (anglais): <https://over-lap.co.jp/narou/865544077/>

altTitles.ja: ハーフサキュバスを拾った

altTitles.es-la: Llevando a casa una medio súcubo

altTitles.vi: Tôi nhặt về nhà một bán Succubus

description.en: Take a child half succubus and half human.
description.id: Mungut anak setengah succubus dan setengah Manusia

altTitles.ja: GTO パラダイス・ロスト

description.en:
The next stage for Great Teacher Onizuka Eikichi is a prison! 

Arrested due to an incident caused in his class, one that he was made assistant teacher of only six months ago! A newly established performing arts class at Kissho Academy High School, created for students who work in various media industries! Onizuka, who says he has no regrets whatsoever, quietly begins to tell the truth of the incident in prison. 

At last the decades-spanning story of Eikichi Onizuka comes to a dramatic conclusion!

*This is the continuation of the GTO: Paradise Lost story under a new name as the author changed publishers. The content is the same as the Young Magazine serialization "GTO Paradise Lost" up until episode 99, but there will be additions and corrections from that point on.

altTitles.ja-ro: Warau Nikumen

altTitles.ja: 笑う肉面

description.en: "There's nothing in this world that money can't buy!" Denko got the "face" of Sayuri, the most beautiful girl in school, for a lot of money. WIth her beautiful face, she even stole Sayuri's lover...!? Super SHOCKING!! Maruinu's very scary story.
description.ja: 「世のなか、お金で買えないモノなんてないわ！」学校一の美少女サユリの“顔”を、大金で手に入れたデン子。その美しい顔で、サユリの恋人をも奪ったのですが……！？超ショッキング！！マルイヌのこわいこわいこわーい話。

altTitles.ja: ゴスロリJK無人島漂流記

description.en: On a school trip, two high school girls fell to the sea and washed up on a deserted island. What are they going to do about about food? And clothes? A cute survival 4koma on a deserted island, except for a mysterious creature.
description.ja: 修学旅行の船旅中に、海に投げ出され、無人島に漂着することになった、女子高生が2名。食べ物はどうする?

altTitles.ja: フツーと化け物

altTitles.ja-ro: Futsuu to Bakemono

altTitles.en: The Story About a Monster Teaching Common Sense

description.en:
Itou-san, who’s poor at interpersonal relations, was jealous of her mild-mannered classmate Takahashi-san, who gets along well with everyone. But one day, she witnesses Takahashi-san swallow a person whole. Takahashi-san was a monster mimicking a human!

Such a terrifying monster was calmly blending in with the class – that’s extremely admirable!! I definitely want to be her friend!!

And so Itou-san learns the “normality” of human society from Takahashi-san the monster. But while Itou-san is in high spirits, Takahashi-san has her own motives…

A tag team between a prodigy author and the spirited illustrator behind “Youjo Senki” brings forth a thundering tale of maidens whose youthful impatience and yearning jumble together and accelerate! (Translated from the Bookwalker description for Volume 1.)

altTitles.en: Romance & Disabled : our togetherness in that chair park

description.en: Adapted from a famous story from an indonesian storyboard website "ffschan" anonymous users, Romansa & Difabel. tells about Awan, a high school student who has to help Difa, a neighbor who is Awan's classmate who has to sit in a wheelchair due to an accident. this story are focusing to their daily lives.

altTitles.ja: そうしそうあい

description.en:
In a world where opposites attract, a chance encounter sparks a connection between a serious black-haired girl and a charismatic blond delinquent, painting a cute tale of young love and friendships. As the series unfolds, their seemingly carefree lives take unexpected turns, delving into the shadows that haunt their lives. 

An artful blend of laughter and heartfelt moments, this manga tells about the complexities of youth, friendship, and your past catching up to you.

altTitles.ja-ro: Karate Shôkôshi Kohinata Minoru
KSKM
Minoru

altTitles.ja: 空手小公子こひなたみのる
空手小公子小日向海流

description.en: Kohinata Minoru is a college student at a college that is popular for its sports rather than academic orientation. He starts out as a gymnast alongside his friend, Nana, but is bullied by his gymnast seniors. One evening, a karate student at the college, Mutou Ryuuji, witnesses Minoru being bullied and comes to his rescue and drags him into the world of karate. Minoru makes new friends and learns some of their dark pasts, including a shocking death that reveals motives for revenge. (from Baka-Updates)

title.en: My Love for My Roommate Is One-Sided

altTitles.ja: 同居人に片思いしてる百合漫画

altTitles.ja-ro: Doukyonin ni Kataomoi Shiteru Yuri Manga

title.en: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends

altTitles.ja: 恋人以上友人未満

altTitles.en: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends

altTitles.pt-br: Mais Que Amantes, Menos Que Amigos

altTitles.ru: Больше чем любовники, меньше чем друзья

altTitles.ja-ro: Koibito Ijou Yuujin Miman

description.en: Ex-AV star Miyako unexpectedly runs into a former coworker at a marriage interview...?! The secretly connected pair are bursting with more pure energy than you can imagine! This cute adult love comedy hits different and will heal your soul.
description.ja: 東京から地元へ戻った宮子のお見合い相手は互いの秘密を握る元お仕事相手だった！　清楚な文学少女を演じていた元AV女優とオラオラ系男を演じていた元AV男優が素の自分に戻って再会した時、この上もなくピュアなラブが始まる…！カラダは恋人以上、ココロは友人未満!?
description.ru: Мияко, уволившаяся с работы и вернувшаяся в родительский дом, затеяла сватовство. Однако второй стороной оказался бывший коллега, знавший разные секреты.
description.pt-br:
A ex-estrela de AV(Adult Videos) Miyako inesperadamente encontra um ex-colega de trabalho em uma entrevista de casamento...?! O par secretamente conectado está repleto de energia mais pura do que você pode imaginar! 

Esta comédia de amor adulto é diferente e vai curar sua alma.

altTitles.ja-ro: Hametsu no Oukoku

altTitles.ja: はめつのおうこく

description.en: Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt… And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the “Wizard of vengeance”.
description.pt-br: Devido à Expansão da Tecnologia, as bruxas que eram amigas do povo se tornaram desnecessárias. Humanos, que temiam o poder não científico, começam uma caça às bruxas… E um menino humano que teve sua amada bruxa morta, se torna o “Mago da Vingança”.

title.en: Tourigakari ni Wanpointo Adobaisu Shite Iku Taipu no Yankii

altTitles.ja: 通りがかりにワンポイントアドバイスしていくタイプのヤンキー

altTitles.th: พี่โจ๋ ONE POINT ปรึกษาฟรีไม่คิดตังค์

altTitles.ko: 지나가는 길에 원포인트 어드바이스를 하는 양아치

altTitles.ja-ro: Toorigakari ni One Point Advice shite Iku Type no Yankee

description.en: Sakurai-san looks like a yankee, but gives people he passes one point advice. Those who meet him for the first time are often scared by his frightening appearance but through the advice, they learn of how kind hearted he can be. Slowly, Sakurai's circle of people begin to grow. He's kind, considerate, knowledgeable and versatile in all forms of sports…!! Today, the super high-spec Sakurai who has a ridiculous gap in his looks and personality continues to give one point advice to various people, making their day a little better.
description.es: Sakurai parece un delincuente, pero inmediatamente aconseja a la gente que encuentra. Aquellos que lo conocen por primera vez se asustan frecuentemente con su apariencia amenazante, pero a través de sus consejos, se dan cuenta de que tan querido y bueno puede ser. Lentamente, el círculo de allegados de Sakurai empieza a crecer. El es bueno, considerado, con experiencia y versatilidad en todos lo deportes! Hoy, el super-adepto Sakurai, quien tiene una brecha enorme entre su apariencia y su personalidad, continúa dandole consejos inmediatos a varias personas, mejorándoles su día un poquito.
description.pt-br: Sakurai-san parece um yankee, mas dá às pessoas que passa um conselho pontual. Aqueles que o encontram pela primeira vez muitas vezes ficam assustados com sua aparência assustadora, mas através dos conselhos, eles aprendem como ele pode ser bondoso. Lentamente, o círculo de pessoas de Sakurai começou a crescer. Ele é gentil, atencioso, experiente e versátil em todas as formas de esportes … !! Hoje, o superespecial Sakurai, que tem uma lacuna ridícula em sua aparência e personalidade, continua a dar conselhos de um ponto para várias pessoas, tornando seu dia um pouco melhor.

altTitles.ja: 異世界建国記

altTitles.it: Cronache dalla Fondazione di un Impero in un Altro Mondo

altTitles.pt-br: Crônicas da Fundação de um Império em Outro Mundo

description.en:
A protagonist reborn in another world.  Apparently he had been reincarnated as an abandoned child.  Before his eyes were abandoned children like him.  In order to survive, he led them into farming.  Little by little, orphans gathered, and upon hearing rumors of a village, others began to migrate.

The group that had been nothing but children had become a village before anyone realized. Then various countries in the surroundings started to have an eye on it. This is the epic tale of the man who would later be known as the Divine Emperor.
description.fr:
Un protagoniste renaît dans un autre monde, se réincarnant en tant qu'enfant abandonné. Autour de lui, d'autres enfants abandonnés sont dans la même situation. Pour survivre, il les guide dans l'agriculture. Peu à peu, des orphelins se rassemblent et, attirés par les rumeurs d'un village, d'autres commencent à arriver.

Le groupe d'enfants finit par former un véritable village sans que personne ne s'en aperçoive. Bientôt, plusieurs pays voisins commencent à sy 'intéresser. Voici l'épopée de l'homme qui sera plus tard connu sous le nom de l'Empereur Divin.
description.it:
Il protagonista rinasce in un altro mondo.
A quanto pare, sembra che si sia reincarnato in un bambino orfano.
Poco dopo, si trova davanti altri bambini abbandonati come lui.
Per poter sopravvivere, si mette alla loro guida ed iniziano a coltivare.
Poco per volta, iniziano così a creare un villaggio. Arrivano altri orfani. Ma anche come la voce di questa comunità si diffonde, persone di tutti i tipi.
Questo gruppo, partito come nient'altro che un gruppo di bambini, diventa quindi un villaggio prima di rendersene conto.
Ed è così, che i diversi Paesi circostanti iniziano ad interessarsi a loro.
Questa è l'epica storia dell'uomo che in seguito sarebbe stato conosciuto come il Divo Imperatore.
description.pt-br:
Um protagonista renascido em outro mundo.  Aparentemente ele reencarnou como uma criança abandonada.  Diante de seus olhos estavam crianças abandonadas como ele.  Para sobreviver, ele os conduziu à agricultura.  Aos poucos, os órfãos foram se reunindo e, ao ouvirem rumores de uma aldeia, outros começaram a migrar.

 O grupo que não passava de crianças tornou-se uma aldeia antes que alguém percebesse.  Então vários países do entorno começaram a ficar de olho nisso.  Esta é a história épica do homem que mais tarde seria conhecido como o Divino Imperador

altTitles.zh: 斩灵少女：我契约的全是上古神兵

altTitles.en: Soul-Slaying Girl: All the contracts I contracted are ancient divine weapons.

description.en: Han Zhan traveled through time and space, where the girls could transform into magic weapons and fight under contract. The boy would awaken and become a spiritual contract master, and make a contract with them to resist the insect tide together. As a time traveler, he was shocked when he saw that those who were despised were actually famous ancient magic weapons. [Fuxi Qin], [Demon Refining Pot], [Shennong Ding], [Kunlun Mirror], [Nuwa Stone].

altTitles.ja: いつか、家族になるまで

description.en: The three lived together under a single roof. Takaomi is a single father, raising his only son. For some reason, he is persistently being hit on by his colleague, Nomura, who so happens to be able to do both work and housework. Taking overly good care of them, Nomura repeatedly visits Takaomi’s house uninvited and proposes that Takaomi should go out with him, telling him all about the advantages of doing so. Takaomi was perplexed since he’s never even dated another man before. But as they spent more time together, going out for meals and visiting amusement parks, Takaomi came to realise that he enjoyed the time spent together as a three and that it felt precious to him… A heart-warming BL between a flawless younger salaryman and a single father moved by affection.

altTitles.en: Ah, Hang on a Little Longer, My Lord

altTitles.ja: お待ちください、領主様！

altTitles.es: Ah, por favor sea paciente, ¡mi señor!

description.en:
Rose is the ruler of the dominion of ‘White’, a small and poor land. She was getting along with her citizens and living a quaint, favorable life until foreign migrants kept increasing and she got involved in some odd situations?! The lively, entertaining, romance, fantasy story of a super OP ruler Rose and Yggdrasil, the grand sorcerer who wants to hide her away and protect her!

---
When the Kingdom of White was conquered 500 years ago, the king and his subjects were exiled to a small tract of wasteland covered in ice. There they endured cold and hunger, relying on the magic of Archmage Yggdrasil to build the world’s smallest self-governing territory. As the last heir to her family, Rose now rules over this land as its lord. Rescuing former citizens who have fallen prey to trafficking abroad, she pours her heart and soul into making them thrive at home. But first things first, she must fill up the treasury to fund this mission! The business-savvy lord invites dragons, dwarfs, and elves to join in the effort, turning White into a haven for all races. Yggdrasil couldn’t be prouder of this utopia in the making, but will Lord Rose ever get to leave her money troubles behind?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/patience-my-lady)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/qingrenrenwodelingzhudaren/list?title_no=1815)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/lord-calmdown/list?title_no=3578)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001625)
description.ko:
작고 가난한 영지 ‘화이트’의 영주, 로즈.
영주민들과 오순도순 잘 먹고 잘살고 싶었는데, 갑자기 이종족 이주민이 늘고 자꾸 사건에 휘말린다?! 
막강 능력 영주님 ‘로즈’와 그녀를 영지에 몰래몰래 숨겨 놓고 보호하고픈 스승, ‘대마법사 이그드라실’의 유쾌 발랄 로맨스 판타지!

---
**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/patience-my-lady)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/qingrenrenwodelingzhudaren/list?title_no=1815)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/lord-calmdown/list?title_no=3578)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001625)
description.tr:
Rose, küçük ve fakir bir bölge olan White'ın hükümdarıdır. Göçmenlerin artmasına
ve garip olaylara dahil oluncaya kadar halkıyla iyi anlaşıyor ve hoş, güzel bir hayat yaşıyordu.
Güçlü ve yetenekli hükümdar Rose ve onu gizleyip korumak isteyen Usta Sihirbaz Yggdrasil'in heyecanlı,
eğlenceli, aşk ve fantazi hikayesi!
description.zh:
活泼领主X超强大魔法师！
充满惊喜的领地生活开始！
露丝·白是贫寒的白领地领主，她的身边有大魔法师伊格·德拉希尔辅佐。身为白的老师，他担任着领地的各种职务。为了领地的繁荣露丝不断尝试各种冒险，然而异族渐渐踏入领地，也因此带来各种问题...乐天女领主该如果解决迎面而来的难题呢？

---
**Official Translations:**

description.zh-hk:
狹小又貧脊的「白色領地」領主——羅茲，夢想與領地居民一起和睦生活，卻因為異族移民增加，不斷捲入各種事件。 具有強大力量的領主羅茲，與在背後默默守護領地與羅茲的師傅——大魔法師 伊克德雷瑟將會展開什麼歡樂的浪漫奇幻故事？

title.en: I Don't Feel Like Doing Anything

altTitles.en: I Don't Want To Do Anything

description.en:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

---

description.ko:
26살의 봄, 오늘부터 아무것도 하지 않기로 결심했다

엄마가 그랬다. 
손해 보고 사는 게 편하다고.

엄마 말이 맞다.
그래, 손해 보고 살자.

단, 호구 잡히지 않을 정도만.

이여름, 26세 봄
오늘 회사를 그만뒀다.

---

altTitles.ja: 無法島

description.en: A prequel to Jisatsutou. The Japanese government exiles convicts facing execution to a remote lawless island to fend for themselves.

altTitles.ja: 明日ちゃんのセーラー服

altTitles.ja-ro: Akebi-chan no Serafuku

description.en: The setting is Roubai Private Academy, a prestigious girls’ middle school in the country. For Akebi Komichi, donning this school’s sailor uniform is a dream come true. Her middle school dream life is finally beginning! Verdant open countryside vistas. The slowly flowing time of youth. With a gentle touch, the genius artist Hiro brings you this simple school tale… now enrolling!
description.es:
Akebi Komichi vive en una zona rural con su familia y acaba de conseguir entrar en la famosa Academia de secundaria Roubai, a la que ya asistió su madre. Como ella, le gustaría llevar el clásico uniforme de marinero, que ya no es el habitual en la Academia.

Después de conseguir que le permitan llevar su ansiado uniforme cosido por su madre, Akebi empezará su vida en secundaria con el objetivo de hacer muchas amigas. El paso tranquilo del tiempo, la inocencia y la naturalidad, marcarán la vida de Akebi y sus amigas.
description.ja: その“初めて”を“何度でも”──。　舞台は、田舎の名門女子中学・私立ロウ梅学園。この学園のセーラー服を着ることが「夢」だった明日小路（あけびこみち）。少女の「夢」の中学セーラー服ライフが始まる♪　広がる、緑豊かな田園風景。ゆっくり流れる青春時間。
description.es-la: El escenario es la Academia Privada Roubai, una prestigiosa escuela secundaria femenina del país. Para Akebi Komichi, ponerse el uniforme de marinera de esta escuela es un sueño hecho realidad. Su vida de ensueño en la escuela secundaria por fin comienza. Las verdes vistas del campo abierto. El lento fluir del tiempo de la juventud. Con un suave toque, el genial artista Hiro te trae este sencillo cuento escolar... ¡ahora se matricula!
description.pt-br:
A história se passa na prestigiosa Academia Roubai, uma escola secundária para garotas, no Japão. 

Nossa amável Akebi Komichi, a protagonista, entrou na academia com o sonho de vestir o lindo uniforme Sailor, porém, ela se surpreende no seu primeiro dia. O que será que aconteceu? Akebi ainda viverá muitas experiências em Roubai até se tornar uma idol como sua cantora favorita Miki-chan! Avante Akebi!

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 4, Cap 23. ]

altTitles.ja: キャプテンキッド

description.en: In the 19th century, there lived a young pirate king, feared enough to be called the “Devil of the Sea”. His name is Captain Kid! With his mysterious guardian sword, Black Lightning, he sails the seven seas aboard his vessel, the Golden Drake!! What awaits him? Is it hell, or the furious waves of the ocean?! The adventurous tale of Kid and his band of rogues begins here!!

title.en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.en: After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

altTitles.es-la: Después de vencer a un novato en un FPS, ¡Quería pelear conmigo en la vida real jaja!

description.en:
After I beat a noob in an FPS, he challenged me to a fight in real life!?

I decided to go along with it just for fun, but when I got there, a cute girl was waiting for me!

This is a romcom featuring a scummy male lead and a feisty female lead!

(Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1564434/vol_no/001))
description.ja:
FPSで初心者をボコったらリアルファイトに誘われた！？
面白半分で行ってみるとそこにいたのは可愛い女の子！
クズ系主人公と、闘志マンマンのヒロインによる
ラブコメディ！？
未公開の前日章「とある1日」も追加しています！

description.en:
This is a German doujinshi based on ZUNs Touhou series. It follows the adventures of four kappa from the Genbu Ravine that deal with living in Nitori Kawashiro’s shadow.

Chapter 2 and upwards are in color.

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: I Don’t Know the Original, I’m Too Busy Trying to Make a Living

description.en:
One month after getting married, the lord and husband went out to hunt monsters and returned as a corpse.  Penelope, still in shock, realizes that she’s reincarnated into a novel.

But before she can even accept the fact she was reincarnated, issues of the estate start flooding in!

“The price of turnips has dropped again.”
“The people of the estate will need at least three months’ worth of emergency supplies to get through the winter.”
“Firewood…”
“Water…”

Wait a minute… I don’t know anything about managing an estate!

“I think we should hire a magician to work in the estate.”
“I’ll only work for 100,000 gold.”

Just when she thought there was no way out, she gets help from the head of the magic tower… but something about this man seems suspicious.

“Want to touch it?”
“Touch what?”
“My hair. You’ve been staring at it since last time, you wanted to touch it, didn’t you?”

The head of the magic tower, the kind-hearted, dog-loving second male lead, seems a bit off this time.

Maybe I should just run away from the estate.
Dani and Dorian have missed the bus of the school of magic. Now, they must find someone who teach them how to be a great and good witches… Or maybe not.​
description.es: Dani y Dorian han perdido el bus a la Escuela de Magia. Ahora, ellos deben encontrar a alguien que les enseñe como ser geniales y buenos hechiceros… o tal vez no.
description.ru: Однажды двое юных волшебников опоздали на Хогвартс-экс… на свой автобус в школу волшебства. Домой вернуться — прибьют, учиться самим — «гори-гори ясно, злостное колдунство» в исполнении местных совершенно немагических жителей. Не учиться совсем — быть Дэни оружием массового поражения, а ее брату Дориану остаться без прав на вождение метлой. Придется искать учителя, чтобы помог набраться ума-разума… или нет. Такого эпично сказочного прогула вы еще не видели!

altTitles.ja: お狐ギャルの片喰さん

description.en:
A very ordinary and serious high school student, Kamou-kun. Though his days are filled with diligent study, his concern lies in his childhood friend, Katabami-san, who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated, Katabami-san's true identity is... a fox spirit!?

---
**Alternative Raw:** [Nico Nico Seiga](https://sp.seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66393)
description.ja:
幼馴染みは…化け狐！？

ごく普通の真面目な男子高校生、賀茂（かも）くん。勉強に励む日々だったが、悩みは幼馴染みの片喰（かたばみ）さんが毎日勉強の邪魔をしてくること。しかも片喰さんの正体は……化け狐だった！？

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

title.en: Hazure Skill "Gacha" de Tsuihou Sareta Ore wa, Wagamama Osananajimi wo Zetsuen Shi Kakusei Suru

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazure Skill “Gacha” de Tsuihou Sareta Ore wa, Wagamama Osananajimi wo Zetsuen Shi Kakusei Suru ~ Bannou Cheat Skill wo Getto Shite, Mezase Rakuraku Saikyou Slow Life!~

altTitles.ja: ハズレスキル『ガチャ』で追放された俺は、わがまま幼馴染を絶縁し覚醒する ～万能チートスキルをゲットして、目指せ楽々最強スローライフ！～

altTitles.en: After Being Banished For Having The Trash Skill "Gacha", I Came To My Senses And Broke Off Relations With My Selfish Childhood Friend

description.en: Crest was born as the fifth son of a duke. However, as the fifth son, he was in no position to talk. His childhood friend and also his fiancée, Ellis, treated him just like a slave. And on Crest's coming-of-age ceremony, he received a skill called "Gacha." Yet, he wasn't able to learn how to use it and was banished away from his home. Banished into the forest full of monsters, Crest began to understand the power "Gacha." And then, Crest made up his mind. He will definitely survive and get back on his feet.

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
"You're amazing for being alive another day!"

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a "log-in bonus" every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

title.en: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About a Senior Who Annoys His Junior
A Story About a Senpai Who Annoys His Kouhai

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai ga Urusai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 先輩がうざい後輩の話

altTitles.vi: Lão Senpai phiền phức của tôi

description.en:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

---

description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

title.en: Being Loved for the First Time

altTitles.en: First Time as a Loved Youngest Child
First Time as an Adored Youngest Child

altTitles.zh: 第一次成为受宠的老幺

altTitles.es-la: Es la primera vez que me aman

altTitles.en: It's My First Time Being Loved

description.en:
As the only hope to stop the end of the world, I’ve lived 99 lives with everyone pressuring me to sacrifice myself. I dearly hoped this life would be my last…!

“A lady is born!”

I’ve ended up beginning my 100th life. They’re going to give me a hero treatment and sacrifice me again anyways. Is what I thought, but—

“Thank you for being born safely.”
“Unnie’s gon to get dem all for you!”
“Can I please see our youngest smiling as well?”
“Hey little baby, did you miss me?”

This life is a bit… weird.
description.es-la: Como la única esperanza para evitar la destrucción del mundo, esta es la 99ª vez que me veo obligada a sacrificarme. ¡Realmente esperaba que este fuera el final...! ‘¡Ha nacido una niña!’ Y así, comienza mi vida número 100. Nuevamente, me harán ser una heroína para sacrificarme, eso fue lo que pensé.  ‘Gracias por nacer a salvo.’ ‘De ahora en adelante, ¡yo té protegeré!’ ‘¿Puedes mostrarme tu rostro sonriente?’ ‘Cariño, ¿me extrañaste?’ Esta vida es un poco... ¿Rara?

description.en: Sora Yoon can hardly look a person in the eye without becoming a nervous mess. So how she ended up befriending some girls by lying about having a boyfriend is beyond her! Fortunately, she ran into the boisterous and sociable — albeit dense — Haena Woo at just the right time. Together they make a deal: Haena will help Sora land a boyfriend IF she can help her make it into college! Will they stick true to their agreement… or find they want something more?
description.ru: Юн Сора, одна из самых лучших учениц в старшей школе Джеил для девочек, становится ответственной за У Хэну. Неожиданно для самой Соры, не парень, но У Хэна претендует на роль её ухажера. Девичий роман начинается прямо сейчас!

title.en: A Girl with a High Melting Point

altTitles.ja: 融点高い奴
すてマ！

description.en: Homura continues to travel back in time to save Madoka, but this time she arrives at the timeline where she is adopted by Madoka! Kyoko, who was picked up by Sayaka, and Mami, a member of a group that protects stray Puella Magi, join her, and the story of the abandoned Puella Magi begins!
description.es-la: Homura continúa con su interminable misión de regresar en el tiempo para salvar a Madoka, pero esta vez llega a una línea temporal en la que Madoka la adopta como su mascota. Kyoko, que fue recogida por Sayaka, y Mami, miembro de un grupo protector de Chicas Mágicas Salvajes, se unen a ella, ¡así comienza la historia de las Puella Magi abandonadas!

altTitles.ja: 潜魂想記NIRVANA（ナイオン）

description.en: In 1992, Shintaro Kago began publishing what was supposed to be the first full-length manga of his career. Unfortunately, the magazine that published it, Bandai's Cyber Comix, was discontinued in October of that year and the manga remains unfinished to this day. Only three chapters exist. Kago did recycle the basic concept of a girl able to switch between our reality and a cyberspace-like spiritual realm in a later one-shot (ataraxia) and an even later different full-length work (Six Consciousnesses Thought Changing Ataraxia).

altTitles.th: สนามเด็กล่า

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Sensação de Diversão com seus brinquedos

description.en:
Lee Myung-jun, the Vice Chairman of Hyundo Group, lost his daughter to a group of bullies. Seeking revenge, he adopts Yoon Karma, a psychopathic defector girl.

Yoon Karma: A sadistic human weapon created through drug experiments in North Korea. After killing everyone in the research lab, she escaped to South Korea on her own.

Having just been released from a juvenile detention center in South Korea, Yoon Karma sets out to hunt down the bullies at school, driven by the desire to avenge her new father and satisfy her sadistic pleasures.
description.pt-br:
Lee Myung-jun, o vice-presidente do grupo Hyundo, perdeu sua filha para um grupo de pessoas que faziam bullying. Buscando vingança, ele adota Yoon Karma, uma garota desertora psicopata.
Yoon Karma: Uma arma humana sádica criada por meio de experimentos com drogas na Coreia do Norte. Depois de matar todos no laboratório de pesquisa, ela escapou para a Coreia do Sul sozinha.
Tendo acabado de ser libertada de um centro de detenção juvenil na Coreia do Sul, Yoon Karma sai para caçar os valentões na escola, movida pelo desejo de vingar seu novo pai e satisfazer seus prazeres sádicos.

title.en: Takou no Koori Hime wo Tasuketara, Otomodachi kara Hajimeru Koto ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 他校の氷姫を助けたら、お友達から始める事になりました

altTitles.en: After Helping the "Ice Princess" From Another School, I Decided to Start as a Friend

altTitles.es-la: Después de ayudar a la "Princesa de hielo" de otra escuela, decidimos empezar como amigos

description.en:
Nagi Shinonome, known as the "Ice Princess," is a beautiful girl with a cold attitude who does not allow others to get close to her. 

One day, Souta Minori, who saw her being molested on the train, saved her with all his courage, but the next day she appeared again and said, "I want you to stay by my side." 

Can Souta continue as friends with the Ice Princess, who only sweetly melts for one person in the world, that is, himself?

altTitles.ja: ノオトピア

description.en:
Collection of the mangaka's BL works from 1994 to 1996. 3 chapters scanlated.

1 • Kept Youth
A boy, infatuated with his school's doctor, follows him home one day... and finds out that the doctor has been keeping a "pet" in his bed. Who is the boy being kept? But more importantly, why does he look so much like the protagonist?

2 • D-Saka Detective Agency: D-Saka ch.1

3 • Love Bazooka: D-Saka ch.2

4 • Precocious Liaison

5 • Boxed Youth

6 • Dedicated Body
Dr. Shibusawa decides that his young son Keiri should get an early start in the medical field if he's going to inherit his clinic, so he introduces Keiri to the fascinating world of dissection, despite his wife's disapproval. Keiri gains a taste for dissection, Shibusawa suffers his strained marriage, and his wife discovers what's really up with her husband and his constantly snickering assistant in this odd little story.

7 • Handsome Youth In Ice

8 • Dark Honey, Youth
A boy discovers that a biology teacher with some strange habits has been watching him.


Includes guro and non-guro, regular bl.

title.en: Machigatta Ko wo Mahou Shoujo ni Shite Shimatta

altTitles.en: Machimaho - I Messed Up and Made the Wrong Person Into a Magical Girl!

altTitles.ja: 間違った子を魔法少女にしてしまった

altTitles.es-la: He convertido a la chica equivocada en una Puella Magi

altTitles.ja-ro: Machigatta Ko wo Mahou Shoujo ni Shiteshimatta

description.en: While searching for a brave candidate to become a magical girl and defend the world from evil, a mythical creature finds Kayo Majiba, a cute young lady who seems like the perfect fit. But when this newly turned magical girl proves to be a crude delinquent who goes berserk in a conflict, it becomes clear that this may have been a terrible mistake. Now evil—and any innocent bystanders—will face the rage of a magical girl gone wrong!
description.ja: 人類の敵・アタスンモから世界を守る、魔法少女の力を授かった女子高生・真風羽華代。 しかし可憐な容姿と類まれな資質を持ち合わせる彼女は、実はいちばん魔法少女にしてはいけない子で――！？
description.es-la: La chica de instituto Kayo Majiba recibe el poder de una chica mágica para proteger al mundo del enemigo de la humanidad, Atasummo. Sin embargo, con su bonita apariencia y sus excepcionales cualidades, es en realidad la más insoportable de las chicas mágicas... ¡!

altTitles.ja: 冷たくて 柔らか

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsumetakute Yawaraka

description.en: Takara Itosaki's boyfriend of two years, whom she had been thinking of marrying, suddenly dumps her. He states, "I'm not sure if you like me anymore because you don't get jealous." She has liked and cherished her past boyfriends in her own treasured way, but for some reason she is not always depressed when they break up. One day, a beautiful woman visited the real estate agency where she works. After talking with her for a while, she realizes that she is Ema, a classmate of hers, who transferred to another school in the second year of junior high school...

altTitles.en: Precarious Female Executive Miss Black General
Precarious Woman Executive Miss Black General

altTitles.ja-ro: Zannen Onna-Kanbu Black General-san

altTitles.ja: 残念女幹部ブラックジェネラルさん

altTitles.es-la: La Precaria Mujer Ejecutiva Señorita General Black

description.en: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
description.es-la: La General Black es la líder de una organización secreta que quiere dominar al mundo. Por desgracia también esta loca por Braveman un superhéroe dedicado a frustrar los malvados planes de esta organización. Entonces, ¿Cómo exactamente va a conquistar el mundo cuando ni siquiera puede conquistar sus propios sentimientos? ¿Y cómo va a responder Braveman a este extraño giro?
description.pt-br: Braveman é um super herói como qualquer outro. Infelizmente pra ele, sua arqui-inimiga é sua stalker e sua fã número 1. Acompanhe as aventuras de Braveman e sua luta incansável contra seu maior adversário enquanto tenta não perder a cabeça.

title.en: Kaminari Tei no Kiseki ~ Ore Dake Tsukaeru “Kaminari Majutsu” de Isekai Saikyou ni! ~

altTitles.ja: 雷帝の軌跡 ～俺だけ使える【雷魔術】で異世界最強に！～

altTitles.en: Path of the Thunder Emperor ~becoming the Strongest in Another World With [Thunder Magic] Which Only I Can Use!

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaminari Mikado no Kiseki: Ore dake Tsukaeru “Kaminari Majutsu” de Isekai Saikyou ni!

description.en:
What I have in my hand is "thunder magic" that only I can use...!

The adventure story of a boy who was reborn as the one and only lightning magician to become the strongest in a different world begins now!
description.ja:
手にしたのは、俺だけが使える『雷魔術』…！？

唯一無二の雷魔術師として転生した少年が、異世界で最強に至る冒険譚、ここに開幕――！！

title.en: The Exiled Duke Wanted to Take it Easy On the Frontier and Work the Fields.

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生公爵は、辺境でのんびりと畑を耕したかった

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Koushaku wa, Henkyou de Nonbiri to Hatake o Tagaya Shita Katta

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生公爵は、辺境でのんびりと畑を耕したかった ～来るなというのに領民が沢山来るから内政無双をすることに～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihousareta Tensei Koushaku wa, Henkyou de Nonbiri to Hatake wo Tagayashitakatta: Kuru na to Iu no ni Ryoumin ga Takusan Kuru kara Naisei Musou wo Suru Koto ni

description.en: Reincarnated from Earth into a world of magic and tradition, Joshua, the son of a duke, is exiled to a barren frontier after the saintess declares he is not following the oracle’s prophecy. Hoping to live a quiet and uneventful life, his plans are upended when the people from his former dukedom abandon their lands to follow him, insisting he remains their true lord. Reluctantly, Joshua takes on the task of transforming the wasteland into a thriving home for his followers, vowing to complete the work in three years so he can finally enjoy the peaceful life he longs for.

title.en: Kanojo ga Kuzu wo Aisuru Wake wa.

altTitles.ja: 彼女がクズを愛するワケは。

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanojo ga Kuzu o Aisuru Wake wa.

altTitles.en: How Does She Love a Scumbag.

description.en:
Mii-chan loves Hiro-kun, who has no money, no job and he's a cheater!

After all, he dated her for more than one week, he remembered the meetup times for the dates, and he remembers her name properly! Hiro-kun is bewildered and can't bring himself to be a complete scumbag to Mii-chan, whose standards for the boyfriend she wants are just way too low! He's scum, but he's kind. He's nice, but he's trash.

This is a trashy romance comedy featuring Mii-chan who loves a guy like him so much!

(Source: Pixiv Comic)
description.ja: みーちゃんは、金なし職なし浮気者のヒロくんが大好き！だって１週間以上付き合ってくれたし、待ち合わせ時間を覚えてくれてたし、ちゃんと名前を覚えててくれるから！あまりにも彼氏に求めるハードルが低すぎるみーちゃんに、ヒロくんはクズになりきれずに大困惑！クズだけど優しい。優しいけどクズ。そんな彼が大好きなみーちゃんのクズ愛コメディー！

title.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.pt-br: Shangri-La Frontier - o caçador de jogos ruins experimenta um jogo Divino.

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.ja: “クソゲー”をこよなく愛する男・陽務楽郎。彼が次に挑んだのは、総プレイヤー数3000万人の“神ゲー”『シャングリラ・フロンティア』だった!　集う仲間、広がる世界。そして“宿敵”との出会いが、彼の、全てのプレイヤーの運命を変えていく!!
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".
description.pt-br:
O estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, Rakuro Hizutome, adora encontrar os chamados “jogos ruins” e dar uma surra neles. Quando ele decide mudar as coisas jogando um novo jogo de realidade virtual de “nível divino” conhecido como Shangri-La Frontier (também conhecido como SLF), ele faz o que faz de melhor: min-maxes, pula o prólogo e pula direto para Ação! Rakuro pode ser um jogador experiente, mas um encontro com um antigo rival mudará para sempre o destino de cada jogador SLF.

Vestido apenas com shorts e uma máscara de pássaro, Rakuro (nome do jogador: Sunraku) se lança no mundo do SLF. As coisas vão bem no início, quando ele derruba um duende, um coelho e até uma píton. Mas então Sunraku se depara com um lobo enorme e contundente conhecido como Lycagon, o Matador da Noite. Os anos de experiência em “jogos ruins” de Sunraku serão suficientes ou ele está prestes a sofrer um rude despertar apenas algumas horas em sua aventura SLF?

title.en: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison

altTitles.ja: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

altTitles.ja-ro: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

description.en: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko’s life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawa’s experiences up to her greatest tragedy—and what happened to her afterward.
description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...

altTitles.ja-ro: Kankin kuiki reberu X

altTitles.ja: 監禁区域レベルX

description.en:
Ryoka is awakened by flurry of text messages from her mother! Panicked and rushed, Mom is clearly concerned for Ryoka's safety, but she is not to keen on letting her daughter know why. Her reasoning being that nothing could really properly describe what is happening!  
  
The world might be ending! And there might be a massive new life-form on the roof of their apartment building!  
  
(Denpa)
